subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On a soupy night in Tiger Stadium, fullback Jacob Hester ran for a 3-yard touchdown with 1 minute 9 seconds remaining to give the Tigers (6-0) the winning score.
snippet: On a soupy night in Tiger Stadium, fullback Jacob Hester ran for a 3-yard touchdown with 1 minute 9 seconds remaining to give the Tigers (6-0) the winning score.
